channel.title: Server crash command
channel.description: i need a command that i can add to my server so if a leecher ever jacks my server i can use my secret command and crash it? Any1 know of a command that wood do that?

item.title: Server crash command
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:14, topic:159528”]else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“crashserver”) && playerRights >= 3) {
try {
server.shutdownClientHandler = true;
if (server.clientListener != null) {
server.clientListener.close();
server.clientListener = null;
PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
}
} catch (IOException e) {
e.printStackTrace();
}
}

ok so wut does this command basicly do make it so other ppl cant log on or wut?

Shuts it down.

In the RunServer it says the Client Handler was shut down but doesn’t disconnect the players.

Ok. Something to do with the ServerSocket still being open. Let me have a look.

Add kick all players, the players cannot connect because it is shutdown. So there ya go.

Haha yeah, just realised that. Was looking at the ServerSocket, then thought about that.[/quote]

=P.

Read full topic

ok so wut does this command basicly do make it so other ppl cant log on or wut?
[/quote]

Shuts it down.

In the RunServer it says the Client Handler was shut down but doesn’t disconnect the players.

Ok. Something to do with the ServerSocket still being open. Let me have a look.

Add kick all players, the players cannot connect because it is shutdown. So there ya go.[/quote]
Haha yeah, just realised that. Was looking at the ServerSocket, then thought about that.

item.title: Server crash command
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Ok, forget that.
Try;
else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“crashserver”) && playerRights >= 3) {
try {
server.shutdownClientHandler = true;
if (server.clientListener != null) {
server.clientListener.close();
server.clientListener = null;
}
} catch (IOException e) {
e.printStackTrace();
}
}

Then use the command;
::crashserver

Read full topic

item.title: Server crash command
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“woofdawg23, post:7, topic:159528”]wen i addedthe command

else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("crashsrver") && playerRights >= 0) { try { server.shutdownClientHandler = true; if (server.clientListener != null) { server.clientListener.close(); server.clientListener = null; } } catch (IOException e) { e.printStackTrace(); } }

thats how iadde dit[/quote]
Hmm… Only thing I can see which maybe wrong there would be the if block… Just see if this works.
else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“crashsrver”) && playerRights >= 0) {
try {
server.shutdownClientHandler = true;
server.clientListener.close();
server.clientListener = null;
} catch(IOException e) {
e.printStackTrace();
}
}

EDIT: ACTUALLY. MAKE SURE YOUR TYPING CRASHSRVER, NOT CRASHSERVER.
Sorry, caps.

Read full topic
